::Composer/Orchestra::

      Composer nodded.

       "Ya, you never know =
when a deep-sea assault will break out!" He said.

       Then, Composer th=
ought of something.

        "Hey Wheeljack, what if we were to place some =
sort of lasers or turrets deep enough under the water but shallow enough to=
 hit targets?  What I'm saying is, what if we put defence turrets hidden un=
derwater so enemies can't see them, and when our enemies approach within a =
certain range, the turrets fire up at the surface.  The water could be grea=
t to hide weapons and stuff too," He said some of his ideas.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Orchestra walks carefully into the re=
programation chamber.

         "Let's do it," He said.
